attributes.additional_details:
There have been many debates about same sex couples, that they're different, that it’s not right.
Granted it’s odd to see a same sex couple in public but they're the same as everyone else all that’s different is their sexual orientation.

So I call upon the Ministry of Justice to stick their foot out and see that same sex couples are treated the same as any other couple and not be stereotyped by the populous of the UK.
